title: The Mt. Gox Hack
description: A fast breakdown of The Mt. Gox Hack for builders.

hook.text: Mt. Gox once handled 70% of all Bitcoin trades. In 2014, it revealed that 850,000 Bitcoins had been stolen.

buildup.text: The exchange had been slowly drained over several years. Hackers exploited poor security and nobody noticed.

twist.text: 200,000 Bitcoins were later found in an old wallet. KarpelÃ¨s claimed he had simply forgotten about them.

climax.text: Creditors waited a decade for partial repayment. Mt. Gox remains the most infamous exchange failure in crypto history.

punchline.text: The biggest Bitcoin exchange lost 850,000 coins over years without noticing.
